meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Julie Podlesni Sean Norris Dan McShane Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6286.

td.p: Julie Podlesni, a law clerk for a federal judge from Chattanooga, Tennessee
Sean Norris, a hockey arena announcer from Portland, Oregon
Dan McShane, a baseball game logger from West Islip, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $18,801)

tr.td: BEATLEWOMANIA
THE FOOD CHAIN
LABOR DAY FOR HERCULES
A BUCKET LIST
POINT THE "FINGER"
SO VERY JANUARY 9

tr.td: Lady Gaga was among the stars who joined her new "Plastic" band for a 2010 rendition of "Give Peace A Chance"
